title: Add robust retry/backoff + rate-limit handling for scheduled integration syncs (CRM/Support/Product Analytics)

sections.text: Scheduled sync jobs currently fail or cascade into repeated errors when hitting transient API issues (429/5xx/timeouts), leaving integrations stale until the next run. Implement a shared retry policy that respects provider rate-limit headers (e.g., Retry-After), uses exponential backoff with jitter, and caps retries per run to avoid endless execution. Ensure failures are surfaced as a terminal run status (to leverage existing observability) so the system can safely resume on the next scheduled run without partial writes.
